amendment.description: An amendment to add a section to the bill regarding the withdrawal of United States Armed Forces and military contractors from Iraq by December 31, 2011.

action.text: Mr. Frelinghuysen raised a point of order against the Lee (CA) amendment (A066). Mr. Frelinghuysen stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
